site_name: Sloane Street Gardens South, Cadogan Place, LONDON
description: FELL 1 x Laburnum Anagyroides (Common Laburnum/Golden Chain - T194), 1 x Sorbus Aucuparia (Rowan Mountain Ash - T4011), 1 x Laurocerasus lusitanica (Portugal Laurel - S4228), and 1 x Ilex Aquifolium (Holly Tree - T4232), andPrune 1 x Padus Avium (Bird Cherry - T7), 1 x Quercus Ilex (Holm Oak - T8), 2 x Tilia x Vulgaris (Common Lime - T39 and T4005), 1 x Paulownio Tomentosa (Foxglove Tree - T54), 1 x Magnolia Grandiflora (Bull Bay - T67), 1 x Platanus Hispanica (Plane Tree - T129), 1 x Cerasus Sargentii (Sargent Cherry - T154), 1 x Ilex Aquifolium (Holly Tree - T167), 1 x Cerasus Avum (Wild Cherry - T203), 1 x Juglans Regia (Walnut Tree - T4008), 1 x Laurocerasus Officinalis (Cherry Laurel - T4219), 1 x Eriobotrya Japonica (Loquat Japanese Medlar - T4224), and 1 x Syringa Vulgaris (Common Lilac - T4226), all in garden square.
